name: Zomba Bomba
description:
Fully playable web version of upcoming Android game.

Gameplay is simple.Avoid zombies,collect bombs to detonate Zomba Bomba and kill all zombies in the area.Once you clean the area you get extra life to collect.

Controls desktop:   arrows - moving              space - jump

For mobile use in game controls

Android version will contain more locations,more playable characters,more tunes and it will be regulary updated.

Any comments and feedbacks are welcome.

Created using Gdevelop

Game assets Craftpix  and Gameart2d
Music Bensound
